pageProps.title: How using a vibrator can significantly improve your sexual life
pageProps.metaDesc:
Are you interested in using a vibrator? You're not by yourself. Many women use vibrators to get the big O. In fact, according to a study published in the Journal of Sexual Medicine in July 2009, 53 percent of women aged 18 to 60 have used a vibrator, with one-quarter having used it in the previous month. Furthermore, those who regularly used a vibrator were more easily aroused and better able to become lubricated and achieve an orgasm.

So, should you experiment with a vibrator? Absolutely. Here's why it's good for you and how to incorporate it into your sexual life, both alone and with a partner.
